long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iDropr is a chrome extension that allows you quick access to an eyedropper tool to easily find the hex, rgb, and hsl values for any color on your desktop. You can copy the hex value directly from the drop down menu or by clicking on the hex value label next to the color. Adding new color swatches generates random colors by default and displays a gradient from left to right of the current color list.
